statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, gender, full_name, medical_history FROM patient_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_id, full_name, address FROM patient_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%' AND date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, full_name, address FROM patient_records WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT date_of_birth, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%' OR medical_history LIKE '%hypertension%';
SELECT full_name, treatment_information FROM patient_records WHERE treatment_information IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY last_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND gender='Male';

SELECT patients.patient_id, first_name, last_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE treatment_plan IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_patient_dob FROM patients;
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(diagnosis) AS diagnosis_count FROM medical_records GROUP BY diagnosis HAVING COUNT(diagnosis) > 1 ORDER BY diagnosis_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, treatment_date, medication FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT Patients.first_name, Treatments.medication FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE Treatments.treatment_date < '2021-01-01';

SELECT p.first_name, m.diagnosis, t.medication FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalHistory m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN Treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE m.date_diagnosed > '2018-01-01';
SELECT last_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_history ORDER BY date_diagnosed DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type, cost FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, gender, address FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE date_diagnosed < '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.full_name, m.diagnosis, t.treatment_type FROM patients p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE t.cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, condition, diagnosis_date FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, specialty FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id JOIN demographics ON appointments.patient_id = demographics.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM demographics WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT d.doctor_name, t.medication, t.dosage FROM doctors d JOIN treatment_information t ON d.doctor_id = t.doctor_id WHERE t.treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT ap.appointment_id, d.doctor_name, p.patient_name FROM appointments ap JOIN doctors d ON ap.doctor_id = d.doctor_id JOIN demographics p ON ap.patient_id = p.patient_id;

SELECT p.patient_name, mh.condition, mh.diagnosis_date, mh.treatment FROM demographics p JOIN medical_history mh ON p.patient_id = mh.patient_id WHERE mh.diagnosis_date <= '2022-08-31' ORDER BY mh.diagnosis_date ASC;
